commandvars.hello: ➤ Aloha ${name}!    ➤ Hey hey hey ${name}!    ➤ Long time no see ${name}! How is it going?    ➤ A-yo, ${name}! What's going on?    ➤ How's things, ${name}!?    ➤ Sup ${name}?    ➤ Holla ${name}!    ➤ Howdy ${name}! The sheriff is in town!    ➤ I hope you have a great ${daytime} ${name}!    ➤ Enjoy your stay illustrious ${name}!    ➤ Hey ${name}! I'm a bot! What do you expect?
